body_content.explanation: a phone that you can use without having to hold any part of it in your hand and that allows other people to hear the person you are talking to:
examples: She called into the meeting via speakerphone.
"Her blood test is negative," said the voice on the speaker phone.

body_content.explanation: using the function of a phone that allows other people to hear the person you are talking to:
examples: Every time I call him he puts me on speakerphone.
Thompson takes her call, on speakerphone.
They listened on speaker phone to what they thought was a call from the bank.
